data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Kayunga.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kayunga, Uganda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 7,226 believers in Kayunga to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Kayunga, Uganda today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 10,886 people in the state of Kayunga who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Hindi people.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Kayunga, Uganda.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Kayunga. Through your servants plant 4 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kayunga, Uganda has a population of 21,800.

We estimate Kayunga has 7,226 people who might know Jesus, 10,886 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,687 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, move the 7,226 believers in the state of Kayunga to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

location.name: Kayunga
